item.description:
Come join for our Sunday indoor meetup! Just a reminder that we will have a Sunday meetup on the second weekend of the month for the Winter, and a Saturday meetup on the last weekend of the month. More fun for the dogs!
Check out the place:
http://www.doggieday....

Doggie Day care does not charge us to use their faciity so I encourage you to make purchases at their boutique or use them for other services (grooming, sitting etc) as this is an awesome place!

~Terri & Simon & Louie

Cancellation procedure: Unless there is a snowstorm we are on! I'll email around 8AM if the weather we cancel. Please use your discretion driving in foul weather.

Please note: Meetup.com charges each group a $15 a month meetup fee. This is a GROUP fee and if not paid, our Boston French Bulldog meetups, would not exist.

The organizer is in charge of paying this fee every month. It would be greatly appreciated if at each meetup, each member can submit a donation that goes towards the monthly $15 fee. Give $1, give $10. If at the end of the meetup, the organizer has not collected enough to meet the $15, she will pay the difference. If she receives more than $15, the extra would go towards the next meetup.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll see you inside-just ask for the Frencie Meetup

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog January Meetup
